Name: Petra
Description: Petra - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Nabataean city carved into rose-red sandstone cliffs.

Name: Qasr Amra
Description: Quseir Amra - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Early Islamic desert castle with well-preserved frescoes.

Name: Umm er-Rasas
Description: Umm er-Rasas (Kastrom Mefa'a) - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Archaeological site with remains from Roman, Byzantine, and early Muslim periods.

Name: Wadi Rum Protected Area
Description: Wadi Rum Protected Area - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Desert landscape with dramatic rock formations and ancient petroglyphs.

Name: Baptism Site "Bethany Beyond the Jordan"
Description: Baptism Site Bethany Beyond the Jordan" (Al-Maghtas) - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Site where Jesus is believed to have been baptized."

Name: As-Salt
Description: As-Salt - The Place of Tolerance and Urban Hospitality - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Historic Ottoman town with distinctive architecture.
